work.title: International Outreach Representative
work.description: Develop general marketing campaigns including live webinars, drip campaigns, region based targeting. Generate reports to strategize greater number of student enrollments and support partner development objectives. Accomplishments: Developed more efficient workflow by converting existing paper forms to digital, revamped workflow for transcript evaluation team to cut down admission decision time and increase revenue for the university. Play a crucial role in communicating with the development team to design and deploy a new inhouse CRM system.   Skills & Systems: Google Suites power user, advanced Microsoft Office, Monday.com, Mailchimp, Jotform, GMASS.

work.title: Operations Support
work.description: Perform complex Excel functions including advanced formulas, V-lookup, index-match, macro recording, pivot tables to verify information, apply & balance payment transactions, process agent commission statements. Assist agents with commission questions and tracking down payment records. Investigate missing statements or pay discrepancies through phone or email contact with major healthcare carriers; cross reference government websites with internal database to determine member eligibility

work.title: Office Manager/Outside Sales Representative

work.title: Recruitment Coordinator/Marketing Manager
work.description: Designed successful email, phone and online marketing campaigns to achieve local brand recognition; rapidly expanded candidate pool through social media following, targeted ads, and referrals.Contacted candidates by incorporating email and direct mail lists with MS Word mail-merge functionality
